headline: Enphase (ENPH) Stock Trades Down, Here Is Why
summary: Shares of home energy technology company Enphase (NASDAQ:ENPH) fell 2.9% in the afternoon session after an analyst at GLJ Research maintained a "Sell" rating on the stock, even while raising the price target. The analyst, Gordon Johnson, held firm on his negative outlook for the solar technology company. Although the price target was lifted to $23.49 from a previous $19.80, the reiterated "Sell" rating signaled continued skepticism about the stock's future performance. This analyst action appear
